
5.  Write a function to find the sum of all integers between any two values.

    ```{r}
    my_sum_range <- function(min,max){
      my_numbers <- min:max
      the_sum <- 0
      for( i in my_numbers){
        the_sum <- the_sum+ i
      }
      return(the_sum)
      
      }
    my_sum_range(min=10, max=30)
    ```
